title.en: Agent Orange exposure on Navy or Coast Guard ships
description.en: If you served on a Navy or Coast Guard ship in or around Vietnam during the Vietnam Era, you may have been exposed to Agent Orange. Find out if you're eligible for VA disability pay and other benefits for illnesses related to contact with this herbicide.

Find out if you can get VA disability pay and other benefits for illnesses related to mustard gas or lewisite exposure. You may have had contact with mustard gas or lewisite if you served in certain areas during WW2.

title.en: Disability Benefits for Former Prisoners of War (POWs)
description.en: Learn about VA disability compensation and other benefits for former Prisoners of War (POWs). Learn which conditions these benefits cover and how to file your claim.

title.en: Benefits for Disabilities That Appear within 1 Year after Discharge
description.en: Find out how to apply for VA disability compensation for a condition that started within one year after discharge from active military service.
If you're a Veteran living with a service-connected disability, find out if you can get special compensation for help with certain needs.

title.en: VA Automobile Allowance and Adaptive Equipment
description.en: Find out if you can get a VA automobile allowance if you're a Veteran living with a service-connected disability that prevents you from driving.

title.en: How to File a VA Disability Claim
description.en: Find out how to file a VA disability claim for a service-connected disability online, by mail, in person, or with the help of a trained professional.

title.en: Types of VA Disability Claims and When to File
description.en: Learn about the different types of VA claims for disability compensation.

title.en: How to Gather Evidence for Your Claim
description.en: Find out what evidence you'll need when you file a VA disability claimand what your options are for gathering documents to support your claim.

Get help filing your VA disability claim from an accredited Veterans service representative. We trust these professionals because they are trained and certified in the VA claims and appeals processes.
Women's Health Care Needs
Vietnam War Veterans Health Issues

title.en: VA Blind and Low Vision Rehabilitation Services
description.en: VA offers benefits for Veterans who are blind or have low vision. This includes blind rehabilitation services at VA blind rehab centers.

Learn about the VA health benefits in your VA medical benefits package. Get details on Veterans medical benefits, like which services we cover, who will care for you, where you'll go for care, and how VA health care works with other insurance.

VA health care offers access to primary and specialty care, including home health, geriatric (edler), women's health, and mental health care. Find out how to apply for and manage the Veterans health care benefits you've earned.

Submit your VA pension application (VA Form 21P-527EZ) online now. Get step-by-step instructions, and consider signing in to save your in-progress application if you need to come back later to finish filling it out.
Find out if you're eligible and how to apply for a VA survivors pension (some people call this a "VA widows pension" or "VA death pension").
Pension Management Centers

title.en: Request a Presidential Memorial Certificate to Honor a Veteran or Reservist
description.en: Find out how to apply for a presidential memorial certificate (PMC) to honor the military service of a Veteran or Reservist. A PMC is an engraved paper certificate signed by the current president of the United States.

title.en: Request a Burial Flag to Honor a Veteran or Reservist
description.en: Find out how to apply for a United States burial flag to drape over the casket (or coffin) or place with the urn of a Veteran or Reservist in honor of their military service. And learn how to properly display and care for burial flags.

title.en: Transfer Your Post-9/11 GI Bill Benefits
description.en: Find out if you can transfer any of your unused Post-9/11 GI Bill benefits to your spouse or dependent children. And learn how to apply for a transfer online or by mail.
VEAP
Apply for NCS
National Call to Service

title.en: Eligibility for the GI Bill and Other Education Benefits
description.en: Review GI Bill eligibility requirements to find out if you can get help paying for school or training.
After You Apply
GI Bill School Comparison Tool
Tuition Assistance Top-up
Non-college Degree Programs
Flight Training

title.en: How to Use Your GI Bill Benefits
description.en: Find out how to use GI Bill benefits to advance your education and training. You can use your benefits many ways, including paying for college or graduate tuition, and more.
Montgomery GI Bill Selected Reserve (MGIB-SR)
Find out if you're eligible and how to apply for VA education benefits for Veterans, Servicemembers, and their qualified family members.
VA Education and Training Benefits
Principles of Excellence
Learn about the different VA home loan types, including VA direct and VA-backed home loans to help you buy, build, repair, or refinance a home.

title.en: Home Loans for Veterans, Servicemembers, and Survivors
description.en: Find out if you're eligible and how to apply for VA direct and VA-backed home loans for Veterans, Servicemembers, and survivors. You may be eligible for loan programs to help you buy, build, repair, or refinance a home.

title.en: How to Apply for a Specially Adapted (SAH) Housing Grant
description.en: Find out how to apply for a Specially Adapted Housing Grant (SAH)
Replacing Medals and Awards
GI Bill School Feedback
If you're receiving the Montgomery GI Bill Active Duty or Selected Reserve GI Bill, verify your school enrollment with the Web Automated Verification of Enrollment (WAVE) system.

title.en: The Affordable Care Act, VA, and You
description.en: If you are enrolled in any of VA’s programs listed below, you meet the requirements to have health care under the health care law.
Find if you are eligible to order free hearing aid batteries and accessories for VA-issued hearing aids. And learn how to order online or by phone of mail.
Get your VA medical records online through our VA Blue Button tool.
The Beneficiary Travel program reimburses certain costs for travel to and from VA health care facilities or VA authorized non-VA health care facilities.

title.en: Office of Resolution Management, Diversity & Inclusion
description.en: ORMDI promotes a healthy working environment through prevention, resolution, and processing of workplace disputes, including complaints of discrimination.

title.en: View Your VA Test and Lab Results Online
description.en: View your VA test and lab results online with our My HealtheVet tool.
On-the-job Training and Apprenticeships
Get the care and services you need, where and when you need them, with the MISSION Act.

description.en: VATAS is the VA Time and Attendance System.

If you want to gain computer experience to start or advance your career in the high-technology industry, find out if you’re eligible for our Veteran Employment Through Technology Education Courses (VET TEC) program.

title.en: Dependents' Application for VA Education Benefits
description.en: Use VA Form 22-5490 when a spouse or dependent is applying for educational benefits under Chapter 35 Survivors' and Dependents' Education Assistance (DEA) or Chapter 33 Fry Scholarship.
Learn about possible health effects from exposure to burn pits at military sites.
Your claim status tells you where your claim is in the review process. Read below to learn about the terms we use for each stage of the process...
